title: Erik Spiekermann to speak at The 34th Annual William A. Dwiggins Lecture
content:
A bit of last minute news, but the annual WAD Lecture at the BPL in Boston is happening tomorrow and it shouldn't be missed.

The 34th Annual William A. Dwiggins Lecture  
Wednesday, April 9, 2008, 6:00 pm  
RABB Lecture Hall, Boston Public Library  
Copley Square, 700 Boylston Street, Boston

Free Admission

Presented by The Society of Printers and  
Trustees of the Boston Public Library.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020103054im_/http:/typophile.com/files/dwig-lecture-01_3733.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020103054im_/http:/typophile.com/files/dwig-lecture-02_4302.jpg)
author: Miss Tiffany
